definition: (of a woman) lovely as a flower (idiom)/beautiful
appearance
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
as/as if/such as
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua

sentences.english: Dear, you are responsible to support the family and I am responsible for my beauty.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，你負責賺錢養家，我負責貌美如花。

sentences.english: Choose through, placed two appearance beauty to be like beautiful female roommate eventually.
sentences.chinese: 經過一番篩選，終於定下了兩個貌美如花的女室友。

sentences.english: Dear, your resposibility is to be beautiful, while mine is to make money and raise the family.
sentences.chinese: 敬愛的，你擔任貌美如花，本人擔任賺錢養家。

definition: good looks/pretty (e.g. young woman)
lit. countenance of a flower, face like the moon (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) beautiful

good looks/beauty/good-looking

good-looking and intelligent (idiom)
